item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, April 8, 2024 at 6:40 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US banks warn Paris cost of dismissing traders will harm financial hub ambitions
2. Biden to warn Beijing against meddling in South China Sea
3. Brazil threatens to regulate social media after clash with Elon Musk
4. Military briefing: Russian ‘glide bombs’ pound Ukrainian troops and towns 
5.  The great American transport crisis tells us something
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, April 8, 2024 at 6:40 AM UTC
